headline: Warrenâ€™s Plan for Bankruptcy Law Recalls Clash in Senate With Biden
abstract: Ms. Warren called for repealing provisions of a 2005 law that Joe Biden supported when he was in the Senate.
lead_paragraph: Senator Elizabeth Warren on Tuesday announced a plan to roll back provisions in a 2005 bankruptcy law, reviving a debate she had 15 years ago with Joseph R. Biden Jr., a United States senator at the time, over consumer protections and the credit card industry.
